article:
Agame of hide-and-seek between an 11-year-old girl and her sister finished by being a serious game of hide-and-stuck !
The 11-year-old girl thought that if she _ in the washing machine, hersisterwould never find her--and she didn't.
When she _ she had won the game, she tried to get out of the washing machine, but she _ ! She had curled her legs up for so long that she couldn't move them and she couldn't use her _ to push herself up and out of the machine!
She became _ and shouted out.Her sister called their mother Nicole Rhoades.They tried many _ to get her out.But _ of them worked.The worried lady could do nothing but call911 and asked for firefighters'help. Soon the firefighters came.They brought many tools to get the girl out.Finally,they _ . the girl was safely taken out of the washing machine _ only a few bruises .Of course, she won't be a fool and hide in it again.
"She won, anyway,"said Rhoades."Best hide- and seek ever."
